        <td id="L72" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="72"></td>
        <td id="LC72" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“All right,” said Harry, “&lt;?// right ...” </td>

        <td id="L77" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="77"></td>
        <td id="LC77" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ever since Harry had come home for the summer holidays, Uncle Vernon had been treating him </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L78" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="78"></td>

        <td id="L81" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="81"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="166"></td>
        <td id="LC166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="167"></td>

        <td id="L206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="206"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="207"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="208"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="211"></td>
        <td id="LC211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snarled at Harry. “You stay out of your aunt’s way while she’s cleaning.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="212"></td>
        <td id="LC212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="213"></td>
        <td id="LC213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry left through the back door. It was a brilliant, sunny day. He crossed the lawn, slumped </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="214"></td>
        <td id="LC214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down on the garden bench, and sang under his breath: </td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="217"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="218"></td>
        <td id="LC218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No cards, no presents, and he would be spending the evening pretending not to exist. He gazed </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="219"></td>
        <td id="LC219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">miserably into the hedge. He had never felt so lonely. More than anything else at Hogwarts, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="220"></td>
        <td id="LC220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more even than playing Quidditch, Harry missed his best friends, Ron Weasley and Hennione </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="221"></td>
        <td id="LC221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Granger. They, however, didn’t seem to be missing him at all. Neither of them had written to </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="222"></td>

        <td id="L223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="223"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="224"></td>
        <td id="LC224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Countless times, Harry had been on the point of unlocking Hedwig’s cage by magic and sending </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="225"></td>
        <td id="LC225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her to Ron and Hennione with a letter, but it wasn’t worth the risk. Underage wizards weren’t </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="226"></td>
        <td id="LC226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allowed to use magic outside of school. Harry hadn’t told the Dursleys this; he knew it was only </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their terror that he might turn them all into dung beetles that stopped them from locking him in </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="228"></td>
        <td id="LC228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the cupboard under the stairs with his wand and broomstick. For the first couple of weeks back, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="229"></td>
        <td id="LC229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry had enjoyed muttering nonsense words under his breath and watching Dudley tearing out </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="230"></td>
        <td id="LC230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the room as fast as his fat legs would carry him. But the long silence from Ron and Hennione </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had made Harry feel so cut off from the magical world that even taunting Dudley had lost its </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appeal — and now Ron and Hennione had forgotten his birthday. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="233"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="234"></td>
        <td id="LC234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What wouldn’t he give now for a message from Hogwarts? From any witch or wizard? He’d </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="235"></td>
        <td id="LC235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">almost be glad of a sight of his archenemy, Draco Malfoy, just to be sure it hadn’t all been a </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dream. . . </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="237"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="238"></td>
        <td id="LC238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Not that his whole year at Hogwarts had been fun. At the very end of last tenn, Harry had come </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="239"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">former self, but he was still terrifying, still cunning, still detennined to regain power. Harry had </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="241"></td>
        <td id="LC241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="242"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="243"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="247"></td>
        <td id="LC247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="248"></td>
        <td id="LC248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry suddenly sat bolt upright on the garden bench. He had been staring absent-mindedly into </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="249"></td>
        <td id="LC249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hedge — and the hedge was staring back. Two enormous green eyes had appeared among </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="250"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="251"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="252"></td>
        <td id="LC252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry jumped to his feet just as a jeering voice floated across the lawn. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="253"></td>
        <td id="LC253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I know what day it is,” sang Dudley, waddling toward him. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="255"></td>
        <td id="LC255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="256"></td>
        <td id="LC256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The huge eyes blinked and vanished. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="257"></td>
        <td id="LC257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="258"></td>
        <td id="LC258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What?” said Harry, not taking his eyes off the spot where they had been. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="259"></td>
        <td id="LC259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="260"></td>
        <td id="LC260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I know what day it is,” Dudley repeated, coming right up to him. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="261"></td>
        <td id="LC261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="262"></td>
        <td id="LC262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well done,” said Harry. “So you’ve finally learned the days of the week.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="263"></td>
        <td id="LC263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="358"></td>
        <td id="LC358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aunt Petunias high, false laugh sounded from the living room. The elf hung his head. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="359"></td>
        <td id="LC359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Dobby has them here, sir,” said the elf. Stepping nimbly out of Harry’s reach, he pulled a thick </td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="653"></td>
        <td id="LC653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry looked up from the letter and gulped. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="654"></td>
        <td id="LC654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="655"></td>
        <td id="LC655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You didn’t tell us you weren’t allowed to use magic outside school,” said Uncle Vernon, a mad </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="656"></td>
        <td id="LC656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gleam dancing in his eyes. “Forgot to mention it. . . Slipped your mind, I daresay. . .” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="657"></td>
        <td id="LC657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="658"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="660"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="661"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="662"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="663"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="664"></td>
        <td id="LC664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Uncle Vernon was as bad as his word. The following morning, he paid a man to fit bars on </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="665"></td>
        <td id="LC665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry’s window. He himself fitted a cat-flap in the bedroom door, so that small amounts of food </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="666"></td>
        <td id="LC666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could be pushed inside three times a day. They let Harry out to use the bathroom morning and </td>

        <td id="LC667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evening. Otherwise, he was locked in his room around the clock. </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="668"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="670"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="671"></td>
        <td id="LC671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Three days later, the Dursleys were showing no sign of relenting, and Harry couldn’t see any </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="672"></td>

        <td id="LC673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window and wondered miserably what was going to happen to him. </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="674"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="675"></td>
        <td id="LC675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What was the good of magicking himself out of his room if Hogwarts would expel him for doing </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="676"></td>
        <td id="LC676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it? Yet life at Privet Drive had reached an all-time low. Now that the Dursleys knew they weren’t </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="678"></td>
        <td id="LC678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horrible happenings at Hogwarts, but the way things were going, he’d probably starve to death </td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="680"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="681"></td>
        <td id="LC681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The cat-flap rattled and Aunt Petunias hand appeared, pushing a bowl of canned soup into the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room. Harry, whose insides were aching with hunger, jumped off his bed and seized it. The soup </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="683"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="688"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The room was growing dark. Exhausted, stomach rumbling, mind spinning over the same </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="697"></td>
        <td id="LC697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unanswerable questions, Harry fell into an uneasy sleep. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="698"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="699"></td>
        <td id="LC699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He dreamed that he was on show in a zoo, with a card reading UNDERAGE WIZARD attached </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="700"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="702"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="708"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="712"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER THREE </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="717"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="719"></td>
        <td id="LC719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Burrow </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="720"></td>
        <td id="LC720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="721"></td>
        <td id="LC721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ron.” breathed Harry, creeping to the window and pushing it up so they could talk through the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="722"></td>
        <td id="LC722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bars. “Ron, how did you — ? What the — ?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="723"></td>
        <td id="LC723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="724"></td>
        <td id="LC724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry’s mouth fell open as the full impact of what he was seeing hit him. Ron was leaning out of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="725"></td>
        <td id="LC725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the back window of an old turquoise car, which was parked in midair. Grinning at Harry from </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="726"></td>
        <td id="LC726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the front seats were Fred and George, Ron’s elder twin brothers. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="727"></td>
        <td id="LC727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="728"></td>
        <td id="LC728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“All right, Harry?” asked George. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="729"></td>
        <td id="LC729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="730"></td>
        <td id="LC730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What’s been going on?” said Ron. “Why haven’t you been answering my letters? I’ve asked </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="731"></td>
        <td id="LC731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you to stay about twelve times, and then Dad came home and said you’d got an official warning </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="732"></td>
        <td id="LC732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for using magic in front of Muggles — ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="733"></td>
        <td id="LC733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="734"></td>
        <td id="LC734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It wasn’t me — and how did he know?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="735"></td>
        <td id="LC735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="736"></td>
        <td id="LC736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He works for the Ministry,” said Ron. “You know we’re not supposed to do spells outside </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="737"></td>
        <td id="LC737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">school — ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="738"></td>
        <td id="LC738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="739"></td>
        <td id="LC739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You should talk,” said Harry, staring at the floating car. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="740"></td>
        <td id="LC740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="741"></td>
        <td id="LC741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, this doesn’t count,” said Ron. “We’re only borrowing this. It’s Dad’s, we didn’t enchant it. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="742"></td>
        <td id="LC742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But doing magic in front of those Muggles you live with — ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="743"></td>
        <td id="LC743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="744"></td>
        <td id="LC744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I told you, I didn’t — but it’ll take too long to explain now — look, can you tell them at </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="745"></td>
        <td id="LC745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hogwarts that the Dursleys have locked me up and won’t let me come back, and obviously I </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="746"></td>
        <td id="LC746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can’t magic myself out, because the Ministry’ll think that’s the second spell I’ve done in three </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="747"></td>
        <td id="LC747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">days, so — ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry couldn’t believe it — he was free. He rolled down the window, the night air whipping his </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="844"></td>
        <td id="LC844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hair, and looked back at the shrinking rooftops of Privet Drive. Uncle Vernon, Aunt Petunia, and </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="941"></td>

        <td id="L1222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1222"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1299"></td>

        <td id="L1300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1300"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1301"></td>
        <td id="LC1301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At Flourish and Blotts </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1302"></td>
        <td id="LC1302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1303"></td>
        <td id="LC1303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Life at the Burrow was as different as possible from life on Privet Drive. The Dursleys liked </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1304"></td>
        <td id="LC1304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything neat and ordered; the Weasleys’ house burst with the strange and unexpected. Harry </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1305"></td>
        <td id="LC1305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got a shock the first time he looked in the mirror over the kitchen mantelpiece and it shouted, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1306"></td>
        <td id="LC1306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Tuck your shirt in, scruffy!” The ghoul in the attic howled and dropped pipes whenever he felt </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1307"></td>
        <td id="LC1307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things were getting too quiet, and small explosions from Fred and George’s bedroom were </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1308"></td>
        <td id="LC1308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considered perfectly nonnal. What Harry found most unusual about life at Ron’s, however, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1309"></td>
        <td id="LC1309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wasn’t the talking mirror or the clanking ghoul: It was the fact that everybody there seemed to </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1310"></td>
        <td id="LC1310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like him. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1311"></td>
        <td id="LC1311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1312"></td>
        <td id="LC1312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Weasley fussed over the state of his socks and tried to force him to eat fourth helpings at </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1313"></td>
        <td id="LC1313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every meal. Mr. Weasley liked Harry to sit next to him at the dinner table so that he could </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1314"></td>
        <td id="LC1314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bombard him with questions about life with Muggles, asking him to explain how things like </td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1502"></td>
        <td id="LC1502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And your eyes shut,” said Mrs. Weasley. “The soot — ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1503"></td>
        <td id="LC1503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1504"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1505"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1508"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the fire. He took a deep breath, scattered the powder into the flames, and stepped forward; the </td>

        <td id="L1510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1510"></td>

        <td id="L1514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1514"></td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1593"></td>
        <td id="LC1593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2437"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC2528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dumbledore would see through this at once, but Dumbledore asked no questions about the car. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2529"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2620"></td>
        <td id="LC2620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“ There you are! Where have you been? The most ridiculous rumors — someone said you’d been </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2621"></td>
        <td id="LC2621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expelled for crashing a flying carV ’ </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2622"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2683"></td>

</td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2685"></td>
        <td id="LC2685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gilderoy Lockhart </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2686"></td>
        <td id="LC2686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2687"></td>
        <td id="LC2687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The next day, however, Harry barely grinned once. Things started to go downhill from breakfast </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2688"></td>
        <td id="LC2688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the Great Hall. The four long house tables were laden with tureens of porridge, plates of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2689"></td>
        <td id="LC2689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kippers, mountains of toast, and dishes of eggs and bacon, beneath the enchanted ceiling (today, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2690"></td>
        <td id="LC2690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a dull, cloudy gray). Harry and Ron sat down at the Gryffindor table next to Hermione, who had </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2691"></td>
        <td id="LC2691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her copy of Voyages with Vampires propped open against a milk jug. There was a slight stiffness </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2692"></td>
        <td id="LC2692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the way she said “Morning,” which told Harry that she was still disapproving of the way they </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2693"></td>
        <td id="LC2693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had arrived. Neville Longbottom, on the other hand, greeted them cheerfully. Neville was a </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2694"></td>
        <td id="LC2694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round-faced and accident-prone boy with the worst memory of anyone Harry had ever met. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2695"></td>
        <td id="LC2695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2696"></td>
        <td id="LC2696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Mail’s due any minute — I think Gran’s sending a few things I forgot.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2697"></td>
        <td id="LC2697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2698"></td>
        <td id="LC2698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry had only just started his porridge when, sure enough, there was a rushing sound overhead </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2699"></td>
        <td id="LC2699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a hundred or so owls streamed in, circling the hall and dropping letters and packages into the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2700"></td>
        <td id="LC2700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chattering crowd. A big, lumpy package bounced off Neville’s head and, a second later, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2701"></td>
        <td id="LC2701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something large and gray fell into Hennione’s jug, spraying them all with milk and feathers. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2702"></td>
        <td id="LC2702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2703"></td>
        <td id="LC2703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Errol!” said Ron, pulling the bedraggled owl out by the feet. Errol slumped, Unconscious, onto </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2704"></td>
        <td id="LC2704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the table, his legs in the air and a damp red envelope in his beak. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2705"></td>
        <td id="LC2705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2706"></td>
        <td id="LC2706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, no — ” Ron gasped. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2707"></td>
        <td id="LC2707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2708"></td>
        <td id="LC2708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s all right, he’s still alive,” said Hermione, prodding Errol gently with the tip of her linger. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2709"></td>
        <td id="LC2709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s not that — it’s that .” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2710"></td>
        <td id="LC2710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2711"></td>
        <td id="LC2711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ron was pointing at the red envelope. It looked quite ordinary to Harry, but Ron and Neville </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2712"></td>
        <td id="LC2712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were both looking at it as though they expected it to explode. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2713"></td>
        <td id="LC2713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2714"></td>
        <td id="LC2714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What’s the matter?” said Harry. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2715"></td>
        <td id="LC2715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">

      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC3269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry looked bemusedly at the photograph Colin was brandishing under his nose. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L3273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3273"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3358"></td>
        <td id="LC3358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now, listen here, you lot,” he said, glowering at them all. “We should have won the Quidditch </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3359"></td>
        <td id="LC3359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cup last year. We’re easily the best team. But unfortunately — owing to circumstances beyond </td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3361"></td>
        <td id="LC3361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3362"></td>
        <td id="LC3362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry shifted guiltily in his seat. He had been unconscious in the hospital wing for the final </td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3828"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3829"></td>
        <td id="LC3829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ah,” Nearly Headless Nick waved an elegant hand, “a matter of no importance. . . It’s not as </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3830"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3855"></td>
        <td id="LC3855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Delaney-Podmore. </td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3867"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3868"></td>
        <td id="LC3868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The rest of Harry’s sentence was drowned out by a high-pitched mewling from somewhere near </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3869"></td>
        <td id="LC3869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his ankles. He looked down and found himself gazing into a pair of lamp-like yellow eyes. It was </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3870"></td>
        <td id="LC3870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Norris, the skeletal gray cat who was used by the caretaker, Argus Filch, as a sort of deputy </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3871"></td>
        <td id="LC3871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his endless battle against students. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3872"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3874"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3889"></td>
        <td id="LC3889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Filch’ s office before; it was a place most students avoided. The room was dingy and windowless, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3890"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3891"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3892"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3895"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC3896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entire drawer to themselves. A highly polished collection of chains and manacles hung on the </td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3898"></td>
        <td id="LC3898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">let him suspend students by their ankles from the ceiling. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3899"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3900"></td>
        <td id="LC3900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Filch grabbed a quill from a pot on his desk and began shuffling around looking for parchment. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3901"></td>
        <td id="LC3901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3902"></td>
        <td id="LC3902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Dung,” he muttered furiously, “great sizzling dragon bogies. . . frog brains. . . rat intestines. . . </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3903"></td>
        <td id="LC3903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3908"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3909"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3910"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3911"></td>
        <td id="LC3911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It was only a bit of mud!” said Harry. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3912"></td>
        <td id="LC3912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3913"></td>
        <td id="LC3913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s only a bit of mud to you, boy, but to me it’s an extra hour scrubbing!” shouted Filch, a drip </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3914"></td>
        <td id="LC3914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shivering unpleasantly at the end of his bulbous nose. “Crime. . . befouling the castle. . . suggested </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3915"></td>
        <td id="LC3915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sen tence ...” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3916"></td>
        <td id="LC3916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3917"></td>
        <td id="LC3917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dabbing at his streaming nose, Filch squinted unpleasantly at Harry who waited with bated </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3918"></td>
        <td id="LC3918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breath for his sentence to fall. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3919"></td>
        <td id="LC3919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4202"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC4203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Don’t lie to me,” Myrtle gasped, tears now flooding down her face, while Peeves chuckled </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4204"></td>
        <td id="LC4204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happily over her shoulder. “D’you think I don’t know what people call me behind my back? Fat </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4269"></td>
        <td id="LC4269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">game of Head Hockey and the crowd were turning to watch. Nearly Headless Nick tried vainly </td>

        <td id="LC4270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to recapture his audience, but gave up as Sir Patrick’s head went sailing past him to loud cheers. </td>

      <tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4291"></td>
        <td id="LC4291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4292"></td>
        <td id="LC4292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was the same voice, the same cold, murderous voice he had heard in Lockhart’s office. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4293"></td>
        <td id="LC4293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4294"></td>
        <td id="LC4294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He stumbled to a halt, clutching at the stone wall, listening with all his might, looking around, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4295"></td>
        <td id="LC4295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">squinting up and down the dimly lit passageway. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4296"></td>
        <td id="LC4296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4297"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4392"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5045"></td>
        <td id="LC5045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see why we’d want the book, really,” said Ron, “if we weren’t going to try and make one of the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5046"></td>
        <td id="LC5046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">potions.” “I think,” said Hermione, “that if we made it sound as though we were just interested in </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5047"></td>
        <td id="LC5047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the theory, we might stand a chance. . . </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5048"></td>
        <td id="LC5048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5049"></td>
        <td id="LC5049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5050"></td>
        <td id="LC5050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, come on, no teacher’s going to fall for that,” said Ron. “They’d have to be really thick. . .” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5051"></td>
        <td id="LC5051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5054"></td>
        <td id="LC5054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER TEN </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5055"></td>
        <td id="LC5055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5056"></td>
        <td id="LC5056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5057"></td>
        <td id="LC5057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Rogue Bludger </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5058"></td>
        <td id="LC5058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5059"></td>
        <td id="LC5059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Since the disastrous episode of the pixies, Professor Lockhart had not brought live creatures to </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5060"></td>
        <td id="LC5060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">class. Instead, he read passages from his books to them, and sometimes reenacted some of the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5061"></td>
        <td id="LC5061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more dramatic bits. He usually picked Harry to help him with these reconstructions; so far, Harry </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5062"></td>
        <td id="LC5062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been forced to play a simple Transylvanian villager whom Lockhart had cured of a Babbling </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5063"></td>
        <td id="LC5063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Curse, a yeti with a head cold, and a vampire who had been unable to eat anything except lettuce </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5064"></td>
        <td id="LC5064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since Lockhart had dealt with him. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5065"></td>
        <td id="LC5065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5066"></td>
        <td id="LC5066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry was hauled to the front of the class during their very next Defense Against the Dark Arts </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5067"></td>
        <td id="LC5067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lesson, this time acting a werewolf. If he hadn’t had a very good reason for keeping Lockhart in a </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5068"></td>
        <td id="LC5068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good mood, he would have refused to do it. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5069"></td>
        <td id="LC5069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5070"></td>
        <td id="LC5070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Nice loud howl, Harry — exactly — and then, if you’ll believe it, I pounced — like this — </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5071"></td>
        <td id="LC5071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slammed him to the floor — thus with one hand, I managed to hold him down — with my other, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5072"></td>
        <td id="LC5072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5073"></td>
        <td id="LC5073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I put my wand to his throat — I then screwed up my remaining strength and performed the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5074"></td>
        <td id="LC5074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immensely complex Homorphus Charm - he let out a piteous moan — go on, Harry — higher </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5075"></td>
        <td id="LC5075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than that — good — the fur vanished — the fangs shrank — and he turned back into a man. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5076"></td>
        <td id="LC5076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Simple, yet effective — and another village will remember me forever as the hero who delivered </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5077"></td>
        <td id="LC5077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them from the monthly terror of werewolf attacks.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5078"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5090"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5114"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5115"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5116"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5132"></td>
        <td id="LC5132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5133"></td>
        <td id="LC5133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They dropped their voices as they entered the muffled stillness of the library. Madam Pince, the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5134"></td>
        <td id="LC5134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">librarian, was a thin, irritable woman who looked like an underfed vulture. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5135"></td>
        <td id="LC5135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5136"></td>
        <td id="LC5136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Moste Potente Potions?” she repeated suspiciously, trying to take the note from Hermione; but </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5137"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5412"></td>
        <td id="LC5412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Seeker was injured. “Great capture, Harry, really spectacular, your best yet, I’d say — ” </td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L5874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5874"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5966"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6057"></td>
        <td id="LC6057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6058"></td>
        <td id="LC6058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Come on,” said Ron’s voice in his ear. “Move — come on — ” </td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6428"></td>
        <td id="LC6428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry yelled in shock and backed away into the desk. He looked feverishly around in case there </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6429"></td>
        <td id="LC6429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a glass of water somewhere but couldn’t see one; the bird, meanwhile, had become a </td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6801"></td>
        <td id="LC6801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry and Ron opened the door of the bathroom carefully, checked that the coast was clear, and </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6802"></td>

        <td id="LC6837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constantly checking their watches to see how much time they had left. After a quarter of an hour, </td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6891"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6892"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6893"></td>
        <td id="LC6893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6894"></td>
        <td id="LC6894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, yeah — pure-blood!” said Malfoy, not listening, and a stone door concealed in the wall slid </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6895"></td>
        <td id="LC6895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">open. Malfoy marched through it, and Harry and Ron followed him. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6896"></td>
        <td id="LC6896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6897"></td>

        <td id="L7458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7458"></td>
        <td id="LC7458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7459"></td>
        <td id="LC7459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Wonder what Potter’s written in this?” said Malfoy, who obviously hadn’t noticed the year on </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7460"></td>
        <td id="LC7460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the cover and thought he had Harry’s own diary. A hush fell over the onlookers. Ginny was </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7461"></td>
        <td id="LC7461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">staring from the diary to Harry, looking terrified. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7462"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7464"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7466"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7505"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7509"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7522"></td>
        <td id="LC7522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What do you mean?” Harry scrawled, blotting the page in his excitement. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7523"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7527"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7529"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7530"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7531"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7532"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7533"></td>
        <td id="LC7533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Of course I know about the Chamber of Secrets. In my day, they told us it was a legend, that it </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7534"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC7535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attacked several students, finally killing one. I caught the person who’d opened the Chamber and </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7536"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7537"></td>
        <td id="LC7537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at Hogwarts, forbade me to tell the truth. A story was given out that the girl had died in a freak </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7538"></td>
        <td id="LC7538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accident. They gave me a nice, shiny, engraved trophy for my trouble and warned me to keep my </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC7539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mouth shut. But I knew it could happen again. The monster lived on, and the one who had the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7540"></td>
        <td id="LC7540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power to release it was not imprisoned.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7541"></td>
        <td id="LC7541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7542"></td>
        <td id="LC7542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry nearly upset his ink bottle in his hurry to write back. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7543"></td>
        <td id="LC7543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7544"></td>
        <td id="LC7544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s happening again now. There have been three attacks and no one seems to know who’s </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7545"></td>
        <td id="LC7545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind them. Who was it last time?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7546"></td>
        <td id="LC7546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7547"></td>
        <td id="LC7547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I can show you, if you like, “came Riddle’s reply. “You don’t have to take my word for it. I can </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7548"></td>
        <td id="LC7548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take you inside my memory of the night when I caught him.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7549"></td>
        <td id="LC7549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7550"></td>

        <td id="L7642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7642"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7738"></td>
        <td id="LC7738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Stand aside,” said Riddle, drawing out his wand. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7739"></td>
        <td id="LC7739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7740"></td>
        <td id="LC7740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His spell lit the corridor with a sudden flaming light. The door behind the large boy flew open </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7741"></td>
        <td id="LC7741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with such force it knocked him into the wall opposite. And out of it came something that made </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7742"></td>
        <td id="LC7742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry let out a long, piercing scream unheard by anyone. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7743"></td>
        <td id="LC7743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7744"></td>
        <td id="LC7744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A vast, low-slung, hairy body and a tangle of black legs; a gleam of many eyes and a pair of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7745"></td>
        <td id="LC7745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">razor-sharp pincers — Riddle raised his wand again, but he was too late. The thing bowled him </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7746"></td>
        <td id="LC7746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over as it scuttled away, tearing up the corridor and out of sight. Riddle scrambled to his feet, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7747"></td>
        <td id="LC7747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking after it; he raised his wand, but the huge boy leapt on him, seized his wand, and threw </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7748"></td>
        <td id="LC7748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him back down, yelling, “NOOOOOO!” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7749"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7750"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7772"></td>

        <td id="L7773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7773"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7774"></td>
        <td id="LC7774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry, Ron, and Hennione had always known that Hagrid had an unfortunate liking for large and </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7775"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7779"></td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L7809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7809"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7821"></td>
        <td id="LC7821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the end, they decided that they would not say anything to Hagrid unless there was another </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7822"></td>

        <td id="L7825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7825"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7827"></td>
        <td id="LC7827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">politely to pass a bucket of leaping toadstools in Herbology one day, and in March several of the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7828"></td>
        <td id="LC7828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mandrakes threw a loud and raucous party in greenhouse three. This made Professor Sprout very </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7829"></td>
        <td id="LC7829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happy. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7830"></td>
        <td id="LC7830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7831"></td>
        <td id="LC7831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The moment they start trying to move into each other’s pots, we’ll know they’re fully mature,” </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8577"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC8666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crowd of spiders; it was like applause, except applause didn’t usually make Harry feel sick with </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8667"></td>

        <td id="L8668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8668"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8669"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8670"></td>
        <td id="LC8670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">why they made him leave the school. They believed that / was the monster that dwells in what </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8671"></td>

        <td id="L9234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9234"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9793"></td>
        <td id="LC9793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9794"></td>
        <td id="LC9794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“So I made Ginny write her own farewell on the wall and come down here to wait. She struggled </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9795"></td>
        <td id="LC9795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and cried and became very boring. But there isn’t much life left in her. . . She put too much into </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9796"></td>
        <td id="LC9796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the diary, into me. Enough to let me leave its pages at last. . . I have been waiting for you to </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9797"></td>
        <td id="LC9797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appear since we arrived here. I knew you’d come. I have many questions for you, Harry Potter.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9798"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9799"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9800"></td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9821"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9822"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9823"></td>
        <td id="LC9823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You see?” he whispered. “It was a name I was already using at Hogwarts, to my most intimate </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9824"></td>
        <td id="LC9824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friends only, of course. You think I was going to use my filthy Muggle father’s name forever? I, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9825"></td>
        <td id="LC9825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in whose veins runs the blood of Salazar Slytherin himself, through my mother’s side? I, keep </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9826"></td>
        <td id="LC9826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the name of a foul, common Muggle, who abandoned me even before I was born, just because he </td>

        <td id="L9827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9827"></td>

        <td id="L9829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9829"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9830"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9835"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9836"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9838"></td>

</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC9840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all that, but the greatest wizard in the world is Albus Dumbledore. Everyone says so. Even when </td>

        <td id="L9844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9844"></td>
