        <td id="L9853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9853"></td>
        <td id="LC9853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Music was coming from somewhere. Riddle whirled around to stare down the empty Chamber. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9854"></td>
        <td id="LC9854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The music was growing louder. It was eerie, spine-tingling, unearthly; it lifted the hair on </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9855"></td>
        <td id="LC9855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry’s scalp and made his heart feel as though it was swelling to twice its normal size. Then, as </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9878"></td>
        <td id="LC9878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9879"></td>
        <td id="LC9879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Riddle began to laugh again. He laughed so hard that the dark chamber rang with it, as though </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9880"></td>
        <td id="LC9880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ten Riddles were laughing at once. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9881"></td>
        <td id="LC9881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9882"></td>
        <td id="LC9882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“This is what Dumbledore sends his defender! A songbird and an old hat! Do you feel brave, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9883"></td>
        <td id="LC9883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry Potter? Do you feel safe now?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9884"></td>
        <td id="LC9884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9885"></td>
        <td id="LC9885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry didn’t answer. He might not see what use Fawkes or the Sorting Hat were, but he was no </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10162"></td>
        <td id="LC10162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry bent down and looked up the long, dark pipe. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10163"></td>
        <td id="LC10163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10164"></td>
        <td id="LC10164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Have you thought how we’re going to get back up this?” he said to Ron. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10165"></td>
        <td id="LC10165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10166"></td>
        <td id="LC10166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ron shook his head, but Fawkes the phoenix had swooped past Harry and was now fluttering in </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10167"></td>
        <td id="LC10167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">front of him, his beady eyes bright in the dark. He was waving his long golden tail feathers. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10168"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10172"></td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10221"></td>
        <td id="LC10221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dobby’s Reward </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10222"></td>
        <td id="LC10222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10223"></td>
        <td id="LC10223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For a moment there was silence as Harry, Ron, Ginny, and Lockhart stood in the doorway, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10224"></td>
        <td id="LC10224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">covered in muck and slime and (in Harry’s case) blood. Then there was a scream. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10225"></td>
        <td id="LC10225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10226"></td>
        <td id="LC10226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ginny!” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10227"></td>
        <td id="LC10227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10228"></td>
        <td id="LC10228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was Mrs. Weasley, who had been sitting crying in front of the fire. She leapt to her feet, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10229"></td>
        <td id="LC10229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">closely followed by Mr. Weasley, and both of them flung themselves on their daughter. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10230"></td>
        <td id="LC10230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10231"></td>
        <td id="LC10231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry, however, was looking past them. Professor Dumbledore was standing by the mantelpiece, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10232"></td>
        <td id="LC10232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beaming, next to Professor McGonagall, who was taking great, steadying gasps, clutching her </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10233"></td>
        <td id="LC10233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chest. Fawkes went whooshing past Harry’s ear and settled on Dumbledore’s shoulder, just as </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10234"></td>
        <td id="LC10234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry found himself and Ron being swept into Mrs. Weasley’s tight embrace. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10235"></td>
        <td id="LC10235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10236"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10237"></td>
        <td id="LC10237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10238"></td>
        <td id="LC10238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I think we’d all like to know that,” said Professor McGonagall weakly. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10239"></td>
        <td id="LC10239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10240"></td>
        <td id="LC10240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Weasley let go of Harry, who hesitated for a moment, then walked over to the desk and laid </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10241"></td>
        <td id="LC10241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon it the Sorting Hat, the ruby-encrusted sword, and what remained of Riddle’s diary. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10242"></td>
        <td id="LC10242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10243"></td>
        <td id="LC10243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then he started telling them everything. For nearly a quarter of an hour he spoke into the rapt </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10244"></td>
        <td id="LC10244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silence: He told them about hearing the disembodied voice, how Hermione had finally realized </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10245"></td>
        <td id="LC10245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he was hearing a basilisk in the pipes; how he and Ron had followed the spiders into the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10246"></td>
        <td id="LC10246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forest, that Aragog had told them where the last victim of the basilisk had died; how he had </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10247"></td>
        <td id="LC10247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guessed that Moaning Myrtle had been the victim, and that the entrance to the Chamber of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10248"></td>
        <td id="LC10248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Secrets might be in her bathroom. . . </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10249"></td>
        <td id="LC10249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10250"></td>
        <td id="LC10250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Very well,” Professor McGonagall prompted him as he paused, “so you found out where the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10251"></td>
        <td id="LC10251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entrance was — breaking a hundred school rules into pieces along the way, I might add — but </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10252"></td>
        <td id="LC10252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how on earth did you all get out of there alive, Potter?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10253"></td>
        <td id="LC10253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10254"></td>
        <td id="LC10254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So Harry, his voice now growing hoarse from all this talking, told them about Fawkes’s timely </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10255"></td>
        <td id="LC10255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrival and about the Sorting Hat giving him the sword. But then he faltered. He had so far </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10627"></td>
        <td id="LC10627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were knocked into their plates of trifle, or his and Ron’s four hundred points for Gryffindor </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10628"></td>
        <td id="LC10628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">securing the House Cup for the second year running, or Professor McGonagall standing up to tell </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10629"></td>
        <td id="LC10629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them all that the exams had been canceled as a school treat (“Oh, no!” said Hennione), or </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10630"></td>
        <td id="LC10630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dumbledore announcing that, unfortunately, Professor Lockhart would be unable to return next </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10631"></td>
        <td id="LC10631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">year, owing to the fact that he needed to go away and get his memory back. Quite a few of the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10632"></td>
        <td id="LC10632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">teachers joined in the cheering that greeted this news. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10633"></td>
        <td id="LC10633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10634"></td>
        <td id="LC10634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Shame,” said Ron, helping himself to a jam doughnut. “He has starting to grow on me.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10635"></td>
        <td id="LC10635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10636"></td>
        <td id="LC10636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The rest of the final term passed in a haze of blazing sunshine. Hogwarts was back to normal </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10637"></td>
        <td id="LC10637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with only a few, small differences — Defense Against the Dark Arts classes were canceled (“but </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10638"></td>
        <td id="LC10638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we’ve had plenty of practice at that anyway,” Ron told a disgruntled Hennione) and Lucius </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10639"></td>
        <td id="LC10639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Malfoy had been sacked as a school governor. Draco was no longer strutting around the school </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10640"></td>
        <td id="LC10640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as though he owned the place. On the contrary, he looked resentful and sulky. On the other hand, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10641"></td>
        <td id="LC10641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ginny Weasley was perfectly happy again. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10642"></td>
        <td id="LC10642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10643"></td>
        <td id="LC10643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Too soon, it was time for the journey home on the Hogwarts Express. Harry, Ron, Hennione, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10644"></td>
        <td id="LC10644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Fred, George, and Ginny got a compartment to themselves. They made the most of the last few </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10645"></td>
        <td id="LC10645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hours in which they were allowed to do magic before the holidays. They played Exploding Snap, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10646"></td>
        <td id="LC10646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">set off the very last of Fred and George’s Filibuster fireworks, and practiced disarming each </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10647"></td>
        <td id="LC10647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other by magic. Hany was getting very good at it. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10648"></td>
        <td id="LC10648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10649"></td>
        <td id="LC10649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They were almost at King’s Cross when Harry remembered something. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10650"></td>
        <td id="LC10650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10651"></td>
        <td id="LC10651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ginny - what did you see Percy doing, that he didn’t want you to tell anyone?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10652"></td>
        <td id="LC10652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10653"></td>
        <td id="LC10653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, that,” said Ginny, giggling. “Well — Percy’s got a girlfriend.” Fred dropped a stack of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10654"></td>
        <td id="LC10654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">books on George’s head. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10655"></td>
        <td id="LC10655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10656"></td>
        <td id="LC10656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10657"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10658"></td>
        <td id="LC10658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10659"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10661"></td>
        <td id="LC10661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s that Ravenclaw prefect, Penelope Clearwater,” said Ginny. “That’s who he was writing to </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10662"></td>
        <td id="LC10662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all last summer. He’s been meeting her all over the school in secret. I walked in on them kissing </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10663"></td>
        <td id="LC10663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in an empty classroom one day. He was so upset when she was — you know — attacked. You </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10664"></td>
        <td id="LC10664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">won’t tease him, will you?” she added anxiously. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10665"></td>
        <td id="LC10665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10667"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10669"></td>
        <td id="LC10669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10670"></td>
        <td id="LC10670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Hogwarts Express slowed and finally stopped. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10671"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10672"></td>
        <td id="LC10672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry pulled out his quill and a bit of parchment and turned to Ron and Hermione. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10673"></td>
        <td id="LC10673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10674"></td>
        <td id="LC10674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“This is called a telephone number,” he told Ron, scribbling it twice, tearing the parchment in </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10675"></td>
        <td id="LC10675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two, and handing it to them. “I told your dad how to use a telephone last summer — he’ll know. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10676"></td>
        <td id="LC10676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Call me at the Dursleys’, okay? I can’t stand another two months with only Dudley to talk to. . .” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10677"></td>
        <td id="LC10677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10678"></td>
        <td id="LC10678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Your aunt and uncle will be proud, though, won’t they?” said Hermione as they got off the train </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10679"></td>
        <td id="LC10679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and joined the crowd thronging toward the enchanted barrier. “When they hear what you did this </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10680"></td>
        <td id="LC10680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">year?” </td>

        <td id="L10681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10681"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10682"></td>
        <td id="LC10682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Proud?” said Harry. “Are you crazy? All those times I could’ve died, and I didn’t manage it? </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10683"></td>
        <td id="LC10683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They’ll be furious. . .” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10684"></td>
        <td id="LC10684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
